name: Dragon Block C Main Saga
desc: An alternate story for the DBC mod based off on the Dragon Ball series. Based on the manga

title: Bandit
subtitle: Attack of the bandit
description: Look out! A bandit with a sword is threatening you.

title: The child Monkey
subtitle: A child with a tail.
description: You meet a wild child with a monkey tail who seems to want to fight...
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gokuKid1;H80;A4;SGoku: Hey! Hi! I'm Son Goku. You look strong... Fight me!;DGoku: You are very strong! We should train together later!

title: The thief.
subtitle: Yamcha the thief.
description: A young man comes up to you. He seems to be quite aggressive.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.yamcha1;H85;A4;SYamcha: Hi! My name is Yamcha. You may be nice or not, I can't let you go without you giving me your money...;DYamcha: Aaah my tooth! You will pay for that!

title: Turtle Hermit
subtitle: The grand master of the turtles
description: If you are looking to become more powerful, go see Turtle Hermit also called Muten Roshi. He lives in the islands in the South-East.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.roshi;GHmm... You want to become my student? You clearly have the potential. I can teach you a thing or two... ;BI'm fine with that!

title: Turtle School Training
subtitle: The beginning of the Turtle School Training.
description: Ask Turtle Hermit what you have to do for your training.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.roshi;GI could give you the full turtle school kimono but I have only one copy... And my other students have taken the bottom and the top. For you it remains only the boots... If you want to recover the rest you will have to beat my others students. You should find them in the islands nearby, or on the mainland.;BOkay.

title: Turtle School Training
subtitle: Training with Krillin
description: Krillin is a student recent Turtle Hermit, trying to beat them to prove your strength. Turtle Hermit said that he was in one of the islands in the area, but it can also be in the continent.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.krillinKid1;H90;A4;SKrillin: Ah, I was looking for you, I was told that a new student had appeared and that he was very strong. I don't believe it for a second! I will beat you to a pulp, haha!;DKrillin: I must admit that you are a bit strong...

title: Turtle School Training
subtitle: Training with Goku
description: After you beat Krillin it seems that another student wants to fight against you. You recognize his face, and especially his rather unique hair. This is Son Goku!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gokuKid1;H100;A4;SGoku: Hey, I recognize you! I knew that we will meet again! I am stronger than before, and this time I'll defeat you!;DGoku: Ah... Ah... You're really strong... But I can't wait to fight again!

title: End of training
subtitle: End of the Turtle School training
description: You beat the two current Turtle Hermit students. Go back to the turtle master.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.roshi;GYou have beaten my two students?! Even goku?! Well I did not think you go it in you... You are now officially one of my students.;BThanks.

title: Blue
subtitle: The General Blue
description: The General Blue is a member of the Red Ribbon Army, he is bloodthirsty and merciless. Prepare yourself for a fight.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.generalBlue;H150;A5;SBlue: Ah I know you, according to our information you possesses a dragon ball, you will have to die!;DBlue: Me... bleeding... impossible...

title: Karine
subtitle: The Master Karine
description: The master Karine is a hermit who lives in a very large tower. If you want to become stronger you should go see him. the tower is located below the palace of Kami, in the North-West.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.karin;GHello, I'm Master Karin, congratulations on your ascent. If you don't have impure motives, I can teach you a thing or two and I can also give you senzus. It is a magic bean which removes hunger and heals all wounds.;BOkay.

title: Tao
subtitle: The Mercenary Taopaipai
description: The Mercenary Taopaipai was recruited by the Red Ribbon to eliminate you. He might attack you at any time.
objectives: kill;Njinryuudragonblockc.MercenaryTao;H200;A7;STao: I am Taopaipai, a real star, among hitmans. Unfortunately I did not come to sign autographs... hahaha!;DTao: How... I can not believe it...

title: Goku
subtitle: The return of Goku.
description: Goku comes in front of you, determined, then a friendly grin appears on his face. It seems he want to fight!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gokuKid2;H250;A8;SGoku: Did you take care of Taopaipai? Great, he was causing problems for Upa and his father. Well, I would like to take revenge for the last time! Did you climb Karine's tower?! Me too and I'm much stronger now!;DGoku: Ugh... I'm going to have to train more than that...

title: The Tournament
subtitle: Training for the tournament.
description: Turtle Hermit and his students are coming to see you to train for the next tournament.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.yamcha2;H250;A8;SYamcha: Hi, you remember me? And yeah, I joined the Turtle School too, hahaha! Let's see if you can follow me.;DYamcha: Always so strong I see...
kill;Nninjinentities.krillinKid2;H260;A9;SKrillin: The last time, you beat me, but this time it will not be the same!;DKrillin: Ugh... you defeated me again...

title: The Tournament part 2
subtitle: Training for the tournament.
description: Turtle Hermit and his students are coming to see you to train for the next tournament.
objectives: kill;Njinryuudragonblockc.DBMasterRoshi;H270;A9;Tjinryuudragonblockc.DBMasterRoshi2|150|1.1;SRoshi: Sorry for my students, they are still struggling to accept their defeat... Well, I know how powerful you are, let's see if you manage to keep up with me, the master!;DRoshi: Impressive...

title: The Tournament part 3
subtitle: The unknown man with three eyes.
description: A stranger approaches you. He is bald and has one more eye in the middle of the forehead. It is accompanied by a small person with pale skin. It seems like they want to fight you.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.tien;H325;A11;STien: Hey you! I'm Tien, I saw you beat that Turtle Hermit and its students. Chiaotzu and I want to warm up a bit with you, but be aware, I am going to crush you in less than 30 seconds!;DTien: Bastaard... you are powerful...

title: Piccolo
subtitle: The demon's sons.
description: Piccolo is a fearsome bloodthirsty tyrant, also called the demon king. He is able to give birth to strong demons, it seems his goal is to kill any strong martial arts expert and to gather the Dragon Balls. You just found one of his sons, that already have killed Krillin.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.tambourine;H315;A10;STambourine: What do you want ? You want to be killed like the small bald one ?;DTambourine: Whaa.. Aaarg...!!

title: Piccolo
subtitle: The demon's sons.
description: Another of Piccolo's sons is looking for Dragon Balls. He founds you while he was searching and he decides to take you on to avenge his brother.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.cymbal;H330;A11;SCymbal: Hey you! I will make you suffer!;DCymbal: How...?!!

title: Piccolo
subtitle: King of the demons.
description: Piccolo decided to take you on personally, you pose to much of a threat to him. He arrives next to you and intends to kill you.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.piccoloDaimaoOld;H380;A13;SPiccolo: You must be strong, since you killed my demons. It's been a long time since I wanted to kill someone so much!;DPiccolo: I understand now how you manage to beat them...

title: Piccolo
subtitle: Piccolo the young demon.
description: Piccolo manages to flee from you and to gather the dragon balls in order to gain his youth back. He is now stronger than ever! He came back to kill you with one of his new son.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.piccoloDaimaoYoung;H420;A14;SPiccolo: Your name is Drum, show him your strength!;DPiccolo: How ... dare you...

title: Piccolo
subtitle: King Piccolo Daimao.
description: Piccolo is now going to fight seriously against you!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.piccoloDaimaoYoung;H460;A15;SPiccolo: I will exterminate you!!;DPiccolo: How... is this possible... My son... avenge me...

title: Kami
subtitle: Kami, The guardian of earth
description: Before your fight against him, Piccolo killed Shenron, the dragon who grants wishes. The only one who can resurrect him is Kami. He lives above Karine tower.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.kami;GHello, I am Kami. Although I look like the demon Piccolo, I'm not like him. A long time ago we split into two individuals. I did that in order to become God and the other half became the demon Piccolo. Let me take care of Shenron's resurrection, it was I who created it after all.;BCool!

title: Hunting
subtitle: Hunting dinosaurs
description: You should train with these dinos, they are strong, even if not as much as yours previous opponents. In addition, this will allow you to recover a little bit of meat.

title: Cyborg Tao
subtitle: The return of Mercenary Taopaipai
description: You beat Tao, but he survived and become a cyborg! Now he want to take his revenge.
objectives: kill;Njinryuudragonblockc.MercenaryTao2;H380;A13;Tjinryuudragonblockc.MercenaryTao3|150|1.05;STao: I am here to take my revenge, and I'm much stronger than before with my new robotic body!;DTao: How... not again...

title: Young man
subtitle: The hero becomes an adult
description: A young man comes in front of you. His hair seems familiar. he seems he want to train with you.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.goku1;H530;A18;Tninjinentities.gokunoweight|150|1.075;SGoku: Hi! it's been a while since i last saw you! You recognize me or not? It is me, Goku! I grew up a little haha! I am going to Kami place too! Tell me, you wanna train together?;DGoku: Hehe! Not too bad, you're so strong!

title: Ma Junior
subtitle: Revenge for his father
description: An individual approaches you. His face seems familiar... Piccolo! But much younger. He is not here to have fun. Prepare to fight!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.piccolo;H540;A18;SPiccolo Junior: You! I'll kill you and avenge my father! You will regret having met me!;DPiccolo Junior: Aarg... bastard... I will return...

title: dbc.sagasystem.saiyan
subtitle: dbc.sagasystem.2.title
description: dbc.sagasystem.2.desc
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.raditz;H702;A24;SRaditz: Well... you seem strong... You know where is Kakarot? If you don't know, I will have to kill you!;Ddbc.itemSaiySagaRad.d.line1

title: Attack of the saiyans.
subtitle: Crisis meeting at Kami's Palace
description: Before dying Raditz said that two saiyans,stronger than him, are coming to Earth. Unfortunately, Goku was killed during the fight and Gohan was kidnapped by Piccolo. Go see Kami to know what to do.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.kami;GI am already aware of the situation, I took a few warriors under my wing. They leaved the palace for training. If you see them, can you help them train? ;BSure.

title: The saiyans
subtitle: Training for saiyans.
description: Yamcha and Krillin are training together for the fight against the saiyans.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.yamcha2;H752;A25;SYamcha: Yo!;DYamcha: Still so strong I see...
kill;Nninjinentities.krillin1;H814;A27;SKrillin: Hi, you have come to train with us?;DKrillin: Ugh... you defeated me again...

title: The saiyans
subtitle: Training for the saiyans part 2.
description: Chiaotzu and Tien are training together for the fight against the saiyans.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.tien;H851;A28;STien: Hello. I see... Kami ask you to train with us...;DTien: Ugh... you're powerful...

title: The saiyans
subtitle: Training for the saiyans part 3.
description: Piccolo captured Gohan to train him, because he saw that he had potential in the fight against the saiyans.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.piccolo;H1246;A42;SPiccolo: Hey you! We should put our differences aside and work together against these saiyans... I would like to see what you're worth against Gohan and myself.;DPiccolo: Hmpf... You are strong but I don't think that will be enough against them...

title: The saiyans
subtitle: Gohan in the Oozaru Form
description: During the training with Piccolo, Gohan transformed into a geant monkey while looking at the full moon! Help Piccolo control Gohan!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.oozaru;H3147;A105;SGohan: GROAAAAAAAA!;DPiccolo: Thank you, we didn't need that in addition to the saiyans...

title: The Earthlings
subtitle: Training with the earthlings on Namek
description: Gohan and Krillin also arrive on Namek with Bulma using the ship of Kami. They recognize you and offers to train together.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gohanKid2;H5814;A194;SGohan: I am ready to train!;DGohan: You are so strong...
kill;Nninjinentities.krillin1;H5728;A191;SKrillin: Let's see if we got stronger this time.;DKrillin: I always have a hard time competing against you...

subtitle: dbc.sagasystem.8.title
description: dbc.sagasystem.8.desc
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.dodoria;H12571;A411;SDodoria: You beating me? What a farce!;DDodoria: Waaaah!! Mr...Mr. Freeza!!

subtitle: dbc.sagasystem.9.title
description: dbc.sagasystem.9.desc
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.zarbon1;H13142;A438;Tninjinentities.zarbon2|300|1.2;SZarbon: You killed Dodoria? Do you think you can show off like that without consequences? I'm going to kill you.;DZarbon: Aarg... Impossible...

title: dbc.sagasystem.freeza
subtitle: The Grand Elder Guru
description: Guru is the oldest and wisest Namekian and he is the creator of the Namekian Dragon Balls. Maybe he can help you on your quest.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.gurumaster;GWelcome... I can sense that our goal are the same, I will help you by revealing your true potential.;BThanks.

title: dbc.sagasystem.freeza
subtitle: Nail the Namekian
description: Nail is the personal bodyguard to Grand Elder Guru, and is incredibly strong for a Namekian. He wants to test your strength before you continue.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.nail;H24007;A800;SNail: I will like to test your strength, come at me like you mean it, don't worry I won't kill you.;DNail: You're strong indeed. I think you should be ready for the rest.

title: dbc.sagasystem.freeza
subtitle: Vegeta is also on Namek.
description: Vegeta, having understood that the Dragon Balls may be found on Namek, gets in your way.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.vegeta0;H18286;A610;SVegeta: You! I'm going to get my revenge for last time!;DVegeta: Wait...! Do not kill me, we can fight together against Freeza...

objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.ginyuGoku;H13142;A438;Tjinryuudragonblockc.EntityNamekFrog|200|0.00025;SGinyu: He he he! Now I have a strength of 180000!!;DGinyu: Ribbit...!!

title: dbc.sagasystem.freeza
subtitle: The request of Vegeta
description: Vegeta has joined your team an he asks you to fight with him in order to become stronger. He is a lot stronger with the fight against Recoome.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.vegeta3;H70286;A2343;SVegeta: Come and fight, I have to become stronger!;DVegeta: Hmpf... I will become the Super saiyan...!

title: dbc.sagasystem.freeza
subtitle: Earthlings training
description: Gohan and Krillin team up with Vegeta against Freeza. They also want to train with you!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gohanKidArmor;H35123;A1171;SGohan: I am ready to train with you!;DGohan: You are strong...
kill;Nninjinentities.krillin2;H30584;A1019;SKrillin: there you Go, Gohan!;DKrillin: Uugh... I give up...

title: dbc.sagasystem.freeza
subtitle: Goku's request
description: Goku just arrived on Namek. In the meantime, he was able to train using a gravity device in his ship. He is much stronger than before.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.goku2;H45720;A1524;Tninjinentities.goku2Kaioken|150|2.0;SGoku: Hi! I would like to test my new strength on you! Come fight with me!;DGoku: Uugh... Well done, hehehe...

title: dbc.sagasystem.android
dbc.sagasystem.android
subtitle: Trunks, the warrior of the time.
Trunks, the warrior of the time.
description: An unknown warrior appeared in front of you, he wants to talk to you, but before that he wants to test you...
An unknown warrior appeared in front of you, he wants to talk to you, but before that he wants to test you...
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.trunksFutur;H151697;A5057;Tninjinentities.trunksFuturSsj|100|4.0;STrunks: Hello, I have to tell you about your future, but first I would like to test your strength. I know you beat Freeza.;DTrunks: Great... You are strong as I had been told, maybe even more incredible. Goku should arrive soon, I suggest we wait for him..

kill;Nninjinentities.trunksFutur;H151697;A5057;Tninjinentities.trunksFuturSsj|100|4.00;STrunks: Hello, I have to tell you about your future, but first I would like to test your strength. I know you beat Freeza and are capable of becoming a Super saiyan.;DTrunks: Great... You are strong as I had been told, maybe even more incredible. Goku should arrive soon, I suggest we wait for him..

title: dbc.sagasystem.android
subtitle: Goku is back!
description: Goku was stuck on Namek when Freeza decided to make it explode. Everyone thought he was dead, but in reality Trunks explain that he was able to escape and that he should soon be back on Earth.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gokuYardrat;H162284;A5409;Tninjinentities.gokuYardratSsj|150|4.0;SGoku: What are you doing here? Have you been waiting for my arrival? Ah lucky me, I would like to test my new power on you!;DGoku: Ahahah, I see that it is not enough... But the next time will not be the same!

title: dbc.sagasystem.android
subtitle: Trunks wants to tell you about the future.
description: After testing you, Trunks absolutely wanted to see you to tell you about your future.

objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.hit;H25500000;A850000;SHit:... I advise you to go full strength directly...;DHit: Nghk! Ngaaaaaah...!

title: Universe 6
subtitle: Monaka the Ultimate Warrior
description: In case you fail, Monaka of universe 7, the most powerful Warrior of universe 7 according to Beerus, would have taken over. You want to try to attack him from behind to see how strong he is.

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: The future is in danger! Help Trunks!
description: Trunks just got back from the future unconscious. Once his consciousness returned, he explains that a man strangely looking like Goku and called Goku Black, appeared all of a sudden in the future and continues to carry out massacres, leading the world to the brink of extinction. Help Trunks beat him!

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: Super saiyan Trunks
description: You want to show your power so that Trunks is reassured on the fact that you can beat easily this fake Goku.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.trunksFuturSuper;H1540597;A51353;Tninjinentities.trunksFuturSuperSsj2|50|7.75F;STrunks: I've been training for 10 years as if my life depended on it...;DTrunks: Ouch... You are very powerful... But I don't know if it will be enough against Goku Black...

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: Zamasu the Supreme Kai's apprentice
description: After investigation you realize that Goku Black is an apprentice of the Supreme Kai of the universe 10 called Zamasu. He uses the Super Dragon Ball in order to exchange his body with Goku. You decide to go in the future with Trunks, Vegeta and Goku to end Goku Black.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gokuBlack;H1693704;A56457;Tninjinentities.gokuBlackSsj|150|7.00F;SGoku Black: You want to kill me? This is perfect, I had enough of using Trunks as a punching bag.;DGoku Black: NNGGHHHH!!! I... I am the one who has defeated all the Gods...

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: Zamasu the immortal
description: At the last moment before you killing Goku Black, another Zamasu, but in his original body, appears out of nowhere and saves him. He then heals Goku Black and with his saiyans genes, Black became much stronger! Take care of Zamasu!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.zamasu;H1420768;A47359;SZamasu: You want to fight? Very well...;DZamasu:...Hahaha... Haaa... You can't kill me... I am immortal!

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: Training with Vegeta Against Black and Zamasu
description: Zamasu cannot be defeated because of his immortality. Goku went to see Roshi to learn Mafuba so he could lock Zamasu. You decide to train, Vegeta wants to join you.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.vegeta;H1800000;A60000;Tninjinentities.vegetaSsjg|80|15.0;SVegeta: The blue form certainly provides a lot of power but this is exhausting very fast... I want to try the God form this time!;DVegeta: Okay... I think it should work against Black.

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: Goku Black Rose
description: After training you decide to go back to the future to end Black and Zamasu.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gokuBlack;H1856193;A61873;Tninjinentities.gokuBlackR|50|16.0;SGoku Black: You took some time... I hope you have changed a bit since the last time.;DGoku Black: NGH!!! Ho...How can you get so much power from this body...?!

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: Zamasu Merged
description: While you were beating Zamasu and Goku Black. As a last resort, Goku Black hands a potara to Zamasu. They have merged! The power of this new Zamasu is incredible!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.zamasuMerged;H38250000;A1275000;SZamasu Merged: The one and only true god of all the universes ... Rejoice mortals for it is an honor to behold this form.;DZamasu Merged: I can't let... My plan... Be stopped... Like this...!!!

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: Vegeto Blue
description: While you were fighting Zamasu Merged, Shin gave the potaras to Goku to merge with Vegeta. Vegeta refused at the beginning but accepted when he learned that the fusion with mortals lasts only an hour. Vegeto Sees that you have already beaten Zamasu and is very disappointed ... Now he wants to test his new power on you!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.vegeto;H2616282;A87209;Tninjinentities.vegetoSsjb|50|16.0;SVegeto: OKAAY!! I am Vegeto! Or rather... Vegeto Blue!! You've beaten Zamasu??!... you ruined the fusion again! Come and fight to be forgiven!;DVegeto: Hmmpf... You are powerful indeed... But you are lucky that I am not fighting seriously because we are friends...

title: Future Trunks' return
subtitle: You have saved the future! Maybe not...
description: As you fight Vegeto, you realize that Zamasu is still alive! Unfortunately the fusion of Vegeto is finished... Goku in a last hope called Zeno-sama, the God of all the Universe. Zeno-sama seeing this disaster decided to destroy all the universe. Fortunately you managed to get back in the past before it is too late.

title: Training with the Gods
subtitle: Training with Whis
description: You decide to go to Beerus planet to train with Whis. He still asks you for food before training ...
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.whis;H30150000;A1005000;SWhis: So, you still want to train with me? Agreed, but I will not be as nice as the last time, hohoho!;DWhis: Pretty good. You start to have less useless movements.

title: Training with the Gods
subtitle: Training with Beerus
description: While you train with Whis, Beerus discusses with the fish oracle. Fish oracle is a fish living in the planet of Beerus, which has divinatory power. The oracle told him that you are going to become a formidable opponent for Beerus. But Beerus does not believe it.
objectives: kill;Njinryuudragonblockc.Beerus;H35070000;A1169000;SBeerus: You seem to be pretty confident. It's been a while since you've tried to fight against me... So what do you say? DBeerus: Hmmpf... Little shit! Don't be so arrogant, I held myself back against you...

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The destruction of the universe
description: Zeno-Sama thinks that there is too many universes and is thinking of deleting several, including ours! Fortunately Goku, who became his friend, convinced him to make a tournament between the universes before. The universe that wins the tournament will not be destroyed and will have the opportunity to use the Super Dragon Balls.

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: Toppo, the candidate to become god of destruction
description: Zeno-Sama wants to see what could be a tournament like. He wants you to fight with Toppo, a candidate to become God of Destruction of universe 11. You will need to go to the tournament realm, Whis should be able to send you there.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.toppo;H36600000;A1220000;SToppo: Who are you? Are you a candidate to become a God of Destruction, too?;DToppo: Wow... well I didn't think that any other mortal than Jiren could beat me...

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power
description: The tournament will take place soon! It is necessary to gather 10 Warriors of each Universe for a free for all between universes. Surviving fighters from the winning universe will be able to make a wish with the Super Dragon Balls. The other universes will be deleted by Zeno-Sama. Go see Goku to find out what to do.
objectives: talk;Njinryuudragonblockc.gokumaster;GI want to be at this tournament! But we must quickly find enough warriors. You can count on me, I'll take care of convincing Gohan and the others to come!;BOkay!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: Training of Gohan
description: Piccolo offered to train with you and Gohan for the power tournament.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gohanAdult;H1592175;A53072;Tninjinentities.gohanAdultSsj|50|6.0;SGohan: I'm going to have to train hard if I want to catch up with dad and the others ...;DGohan: Hehehe, I already feel stronger.
kill;Nninjinentities.piccolo;H9429019;A314301;SPiccolo: Let's go Gohan! You haven't been training for too long, your strength isn't what it used to be.;DPiccolo:...Thank you for the training.

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: Training with Freeza
description: Goku has managed to convince Freeza to join you for the tournament. Goku offers to train with him.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.goku2;H2191207;A73040;Tninjinentities.gokuSsjb|50|16.0;SGoku: I've become much stronger since the fight against Zamasu!;DGoku: I see you never stop training, huh?

kill;Njinryuudragonblockc.Freeza5;H7650000;A255000;Tjinryuudragonblockc.FreezaGolden|50|4.33;SFreeza: Do you think you are training with me? No, I am just letting off steam with you in order to take revenge for the last time!;DFreeza: Uugh...!!...Do you think you're strong...?!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The start of the tournament
description: Go to the tournament of power! Prepare you on a series of fights against lots of enemies from all the universes!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #1
description: This is the beginning of the tournament! Watch out! Frost, Botamo and Magetta are attacking you!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.frost4;H16681027;A556034;SFrost: You'll be the first to fall!;DFrost: Gaaah... Kah...

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #2
description: The trio of danger is a group of 3 fighters from universe 9.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.basil;H8508149;A283605;SBasil: You want a fight? The trio of danger will face you.;DBasil: GYAAH!!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #3
description: Hit is the legendary assassin of the universe 6 that you had already fought before.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.hit;H35500000;A1183333;SHit: I'm much stronger than the last time... prepare yourself!;DHit: Gaaah! Crap... I underestimated you...

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #4
description: Pilina and Saonel are two nameks of universe 6.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.pilina;H6178268;A205942;SPilina: You also have namek in your world...;DPilina: GWAAAH!!
kill;Nninjinentities.saonel;H6103481;A203449;SSaonel:... too bad for your universe that will no longer be.;DSaonel: GYAAH!!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #5
description: The trio of saiyans from universe 6 are attacking you. Caulifla and Kale are two women saiyans who have been brought by Cabba.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.cabba;H3517480;A117249;Tninjinentities.cabbaSsj|50|4.0;SCabba: Ah I remember you, but this time I am not alone...;DCabba: Aarg... you are much stronger than the last time...

kill;Nninjinentities.caulifla;H3781047;A126034;Tninjinentities.cauliflaSsj|60|4.0;SCaulifla: Go! I'll show you the super saiyan form, you'll be in shock!;DCaulifla: Hmmpf... do you think you're so clever ?!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #6
description: Seven members of the pride troopers decides to take you on!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.cocotte;H10000000;A333333;SPride Troopers: Right! The light protecting peace in the universe! We are the pride troopers!;DYAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #7
description: Agnilasa is the result of the fusion between several members of Universe 3. He is really really strong so try to dodge his attacks!
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.aniraza;H35000000;A1166667;Tninjinentities.aniraza2|300|1.1;SAgnilasa: HE HE HE...! YOU CAN'T BEAT ME!;DAgnilaza: WAAAAAAA...! NOOOOO...!!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #8
description: Dyspo is a member of the pride troopers with Toppo. It is said to be the fastest of his group.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.dyspo;H25800000;A860000;SDyspo: Just try to hit me if you can.;DDyspo: Oooh! Shit...!

kill;Nninjinentities.toppo;H36600000;A1220000;Tninjinentities.toppoGOD|200|1.33;SToppo: A candidate for the position of God of Destruction can not lose against a mortal.;DToppo: Wah...! How can you do that...!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #9
description: Kale and Caulifla have merged! They use the Supreme Kai potaras...
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.kefla;H10175000;A339167;Tninjinentities.keflaSsj|50|5.00;SKefla: So much power! So that's the fusion, huh? Kale and Caulifla... My name is Kefla!;DKefla: Uuugh...! So the merger is not even enough...

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: The tournament of power #10
description: Jiren is the most powerful Warrior of the pride troopers and his Universe. It is said that he is even more powerful than the God of the Destruction of his Universe.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.jiren;H40486000;A1349533;Tninjinentities.jirenSuperFullPower|200|1.5;SJiren: You believe you are strong? I'm going to show you what true strength is!;DJiren: NOOOOO!!

title: Universe Survival
subtitle: End of the tournament
description: While you were winning against Jiren, the latter succeeded in knocking you out of the arena. Although all the combatants seemed to have lost, C-17 which had pretended to be dead, revealed himself in the end. Universe 7 wins! C-17 decides to make the wish to make reappear all the universes.

title: Training with Vegeta
subtitle: Vegeta Blue Shinka
description: Vegeta wants to train with you, and wants to show you one of his new forms.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.vegeta;H2632761;A87759;Tninjinentities.vegetaSsjb|50|16.0||ninjinentities.vegetaSsjbe|150|1.03125;SVegeta: Hehehe, you're not gonna show off anymore when you're gonna see my new form! A form above the Super saiyan Blue!;DVegeta: How is it possible for you to always be stronger than me...!!

title: Broly Super
subtitle: The new saiyan Broly
description: While Freezer is plotting to cause trouble on Earth ... Two soldiers of Freezer have found two saiyans named Broly and his father Paragus. In the past Broly was sent to an unbearable planet by King Vegeta who considered him a threat. Paragus now wishes to take revenge on King Vegeta by killing his son Vegeta. Freeza, who has seen Broly's huge potential, wants to use it to beat Vegeta, Goku and yourself as well as use the Dragon Balls to make a wish.

title: Broly Super
subtitle: Broly The enraged saiyan
description: Although Broly seemed to be largely of your level, he does not seem to want to give up and is getting stronger ...

title: Broly Super
subtitle: The Super saiyan Broly
description: While you are fighting Broly, Freeza take the opportunity to kill his father Paragus from behind. Broly enters a state of immeasurable rage ...

title: Broly Super
subtitle: The legendary saiyan Broly
description: Broly's blind rage and power reaches an unimaginable level, far above those of the Gods Prepare you for this mythical fight!

title: Broly Super
subtitle: End of the legendary fight
description: Well done you managed to defeat Broly! Although he is still alive and has returned to his original planet. Despite the fact that he gets angry easily, his heart is pure, don't be too hard with him!

title: Training with Goku
subtitle: Goku Ultra Instinct
description: Goku wants to train with you, and would like to try mastering one of his new forms.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gokuUi;H82800000;A2760000;Tninjinentities.gokuUiM|200|1.0833;SGoku: Can you help me with training my new form, I still have trouble to master it!;DGoku: Haaa... Then even this form is not enough... You are truly the strongest.

title: Training with Gogeta
subtitle: Goku and Vegeta fuses!
description: Your power has reached an unimaginable level ... You asked Goku and Vegeta to merge to give you a fight worthy of your name. Goku managed to convince Vegeta, who was originally hesitant.
objectives: kill;Nninjinentities.gogeta;H16620000;A554000;Tninjinentities.gogetaSsj|50|4.0||ninjinentities.gogetaSsjb|150|2.00;SGogeta: Using the potaras it was Vegeto wasn't it ?... So this fusion can be called ... Gogeta! Okay that's cool! Do you think you can beat this fusion? Let's see this!;DGogeta: Uugh... Uuug... Hmpf... Your power is ridiculously amazing...!

title: dbc.sagasystem.credits
subtitle: dbc.sagasystem.106.title
description: dbc.sagasystem.106.desc

title: dbc.sagasystem.credits
subtitle: End
description: You've finished the saga, well done!
